body_html: We should add a test for that. It's weird, because I think that the part of the test that checks the indices is disabled for MaxPool1d (here). Can you please try to remove that if?
body_text: We should add a test for that. It's weird, because I think that the part of the test that checks the indices is disabled for MaxPool1d (here). Can you please try to remove that if?
body: We should add a test for that. It's weird, because I think that the part of the test that checks the indices is disabled for MaxPool1d ([here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L651)). Can you please try to remove that `if`?
